original_text: and put aside the clothes she was wearing when captured. After she has lived in your house and mourned her father and mother for a full month, then you may go to her and be her husband and she shall be your wife.
korean_text: 또 포로의 의복을 벗고 네 집에 살며 그 부모를 위하여 한 달 동안 애곡한 후에 네가 그에게로 들어가서 그의 남편이 되고 그는 네 아내가 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: and put aside the clothes she was wearing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 입고 있던 옷을 벗겨두고

sentences.original_text: After she has lived in your house
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 당신의 집에서 살고 난 후에

sentences.original_text: and mourned her father and mother
then you may go to her
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 당신은 그녀에게 갈 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and she shall be your wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 당신의 아내가 될 것입니다
